column5: hey, i just registered , im 14 love to fish for trout and salmon and if you know him im one of chrisk's buddys
welcome aboard
Welcome aboard. Chris K eh? Don't say that too loud around here. Are you teaching him how to fish?
Welcome, hope you can teach him a thing or two about fishing.....he needs all the help he can get!

Hey Dev,welcome aboard  Just to fill you all in to who this new kid on the block is he's a young fella who over the years has been growing up with us on the river. First time I met Devin he was about 8 or 9 years old watching us fish for steel from the riverbank in his rubbers. Over the years he's showed a lot of interest always asking questions,picking up a lot of good tips and finally making his way out of his rubber boots into a pair of waders.Also inherited some nice float fishing equipment from his big river brothers    and now stands with us catching steel like a seasoned pro at 14. Just recently Devin has decided to take up fly tying. Its been two weeks now and he's a real natural being able to tie some sweet steel head patterns... Anyhow welcome again to OFC Dev.....
Welcome Dev !!!
Welcome Dev, nice to have another seasoned pro on the board.

Welcome aboard Dev That Chris K guys hes alright.  Maybe if ya can get him down here the three of us can get out on LSC for some musky this year.  Keep up the work with the flies that is how I started I was about the same age it was a blast.
Welcome aboard Devin.
Welcome aboard young fella, I can tell your a great kid by the hat your wearing!!!
Welcome aboard!  It's great to have some more people around my age on this board.
Welcome to the OFC Hoping you will be able to teach some of the old guy's new tricks.
Welcome aboard young man...so far so good Salmon .....Check Steel.......Check Fly tyeing..Check Hockey team?  Cheers (with a Dr Pepper)
my team would be the habs

I was just about to welcome you to the board, then this blasphemy!  When you graduate to a Leafs fan, you will become one with the fish.  Just kidding...welcome to the club sir! (not kidding about the Leafs though  )
Right on young fella.  I was definitely out fishing most of the old guys by the time i was your age, and i bet you do the same.
Ah,he's still using my fly tying stuff....Anybody know were I could pic up an old vise for a friend
Atta boy don`t let these frustrated Leaf/senators fans pull your chain!!!
Welcome Devin you got a heck of a mentor in ChrisK I wish I was in your shoes when I was a teen.   Art
Welcome to OFC Devin Looking forward to reading your adventures along the shoreline!!! Tight lines Leechman
Welcome to the forum! It's a great spot to learn about all things fishing!
Welcome young man!

I always love to see younger ones with such an interest...be sure to get some of your buddies hooked so you always have someone for a partner.....then once you start to drive you'll have someone to split the gas costs with
